title: Increasing the efficiency and quality of the Public Service
decision_details:
- It has been identified that it would be appropriate to integrate the information technology systems in the Public institutions with a view to enhancing the efficiency and quality in the public institutions as well as discharging duties effectively and optimum manner by minimizing the duplication errors and the verification of information. Accordingly, the proposal made by the Hon. President in his capacity as the Minister of Finance, Economic Stabilization and National Policies to take action as follows when entering data to the information technology systems regulated/ developed by all Public Sector Institutions including State Corporations and Statutory Boards, was approved by the Cabinet.

*	making it compulsory to use the National Identity Card number to recognize a Sri Lankan citizen who is older than 15 years.

*	making it mandatory to use the Passport number to recognize a foreign national.

*	making it compulsory to use the Business Registration Number to recognize the identity of institutions and the National Identity Card Number of Sri Lankan members of Owners/Board of Directors of such institutions and the passport of number of foreign members.

*	ensuring data standardization enabling to share the relevant data formally with the other Public Sector Institutions.
